sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
underneath another thing
, je neposredno pod drugo.

seg.quote: The dog was underneath the table.
There was a portrait with an inscription underneath.

sense.def:
Kadar je del nečesa
underneath
, se navadno dotika tal ali je obrnjen proti njim.

seg.quote: I lifted the dog's foot and checked the soft pad underneath.
The underneath of the car was covered with rust.

sense.def:
Izraz
underneath
uporabimo, ko govorimo o občutkih ali čustvih, ki jih ljudje ne pokažejo s svojim vedênjem.

cit.quote: v sebi, v svoji notranjosti, pod površjem

seg.quote: Underneath, most of us are shy.
I seem confident, but underneath it all I'm terribly nervous.
